channel.title: Lo-Fi Python - big tech, technology culture, Python

item.title: When Microsoft Was Uncool and How They Flipped Apple
item.description: I began paying attention to what was relevant in the tech scene around 2014, in my 20s. Back then, I was just getting started studying Python. It was an interesting time in tech. The term "Big Data" was getting tossed around a lot, but the pandas library hadn't yet reached â€¦
item.dc:creator: lofipython
